[Variable] *fragment-char-p*

Package

ystok.uri

Initial value

nil.

Description

Stores a predicate for extending character set allowed in fragment part without percent-encoding. The nil value means that only unreserved characters are allowed non-encoded.

See also
  • parse-uri [Function]
